about_the_game:
********** C O M P L E X a VR Puzzle Game ************

** Complex is a puzzle game from 2018 and was my first game as a single developer.It´s a bit older now but if you like puzzle games ,this could be interesting for you.It´s a puzzle based game for HTC(Vive) and Oculus VR Systems (Rift/Quest/Quest2/RiftS) ( no Index , no WMR support)


** And if you want try my new Game from 2021 , with Valve Index Support and HP Reverb G2 support then look for my newest game
********** " ORKANA CONFLICT VR " ********** new VR RTS/SHOOTER Hybrid

to Complex VR:

- 30 Levels for you brain and your skill (first 7-8 levels are very simple ,but PLEASE continue playing ! )

- many many level to think , solve and combine thinks to solve the level.

- You need skill, remembrance, logic, combination, sometimes speed, sometimes assessment reproducing

- playtime are 2h-4h; for very (very) fast player about 1.5 hours

- enjoy and have fun

- Game and Sound by A.K(me)

- Music by me and freesounds from bensound

- Sound and Effects made with FruityLoops ,CCO Sound Effect from online ressources

- about 0,8 - 1 Gb Hard Disk Space

- development time 6 month.

IMPORTANT:
- use Button A for selecting in menue (not Trigger)
- (known bug: it can happen that one hand can no longer grip. Then please use the other hand, after 1 or 2 minutes it works again. The levels can all be solved and there is a lot of variety and fun for you(hopefully :) )

********** C O M P L E X a VR Puzzle Game ************

** Complex is a puzzle game from 2018 and was my first game as a single developer.It´s a bit older now but if you like puzzle games ,this could be interesting for you.It´s a puzzle based game for HTC(Vive) and Oculus VR Systems (Rift/Quest/Quest2/RiftS) ( no Index , no WMR support)

********** " ORKANA CONFLICT VR " ********** new VR RTS/SHOOTER Hybrid

to Complex VR:

- 30 Levels for you brain and your skill (first 7-8 levels are very simple ,but PLEASE continue playing ! )

- many many level to think , solve and combine thinks to solve the level.

- You need skill, remembrance, logic, combination, sometimes speed, sometimes assessment reproducing

- playtime are 2h-4h; for very (very) fast player about 1.5 hours

- enjoy and have fun

IMPORTANT:

- (known bug: it can happen that one hand can no longer grip. Then please use the other hand, after 1 or 2 minutes it works again. The levels can all be solved and there is a lot of variety and fun for you(hopefully :) )
name: COMPLEX a VR Puzzle Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7 , 10
  • Processor: i5 6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1060
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 6600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia GTX 1070
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: - A puzzle game for HTC VIve and Oculus Rift
